channel.title: Compiler help please!
channel.description:
who cn help me im using jdk 6 update 5 i cant get compiler to work this is what error says
i have been trying and trying fordays now to make my server and im almost done but stupid compiling wontwork what do i do to fix this error
Code: javac: *.java file not found Usage: javac <options> <source codes> use -help for a list of possible options press any key to continue...
